explanation: [0-0] A person is sitting in the driver's seat, the steering wheel has a sleek design with the Lamborghini logo as the focal point, there are houses outside the car, and the English subtitle "POV: Your car is ready for takeoff" is marked above the screen.

[0-6] The camera scrolls down to show the Lamborghini's center console, revealing various buttons. A hand enters the frame and presses the large red button at the bottom of the console, then presses all the buttons above the console.

[6-14] Next, the hand interacts with a series of sleek buttons located on the side of the console, pressing each button individually. It then turns to the console again, turns on the big red button and presses it. With a swift movement, the camera shifts back to its original position, providing a clear view of the Lamborghini's steering wheel. The digital display on the dashboard behind the steering wheel is illuminated in a bright yellow hue.
